title: Fiddle sticks is broken
body: Fiddlesticks is banned 100% of the time in korea, because he is broken, riot just do the community a favor and nerf the shit outta his ulti  he is a easy to play and you cannot deal with him broken champion, people who think they are good playing him arent good and need to be put in there place for talking shit

replies.body:
Fiddle is not op . There are dozens of champions that counter him hardcore . Nautilus,Alistar,Rammus to name a few .

His jungle is pretty weak . He is one trick pony and people can punish that kind of gameplay .

I've learned to ignore "Fiddles is OP" posts. Either the person is trolling and never even played against or with Fiddles and is just trying to get a reaction, or they are just that stupid that they don't understand the million (exaggeration here...but there are so many) ways to counter Fiddles. In either scenario, it is not worth talking to the person. Given the tone of this guys argument, I would guess the former.

If you are going to call me retarded, please at least use proper grammar in doing so. Making simple grammar errors pretty much makes any "retarded, stupid, or dumb" comment invalid. Also, you call me retarded, yet you think Fiddles is OP. Something seems a bit iffy here.
I enjoy playing Fiddle Sticks, is he OP? NO!! not at all. He's like a vulture that comes to pick up the scraps when everyone else is on cooldown(teamfights) he has his place.
OMG finally someone with a brain FIDDLESTICKS OP FOR LYFE
